DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate efficacy intravenous versus oral pulse load clomipramine ( CMI ) follow 12-week course maintenance therapy patient obsessive compulsive disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Randomized Study Intravenous Versus Oral Clomipramine Patients With Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind , multicenter study . Patients stratify participate institution . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive pulse load dose clomipramine ( CMI ) IV oral placebo day 1 2 . Arm II : Patients receive oral pulse load dose CMI IV placebo day 1 2 . Patients receive maintenance therapy daily oral CMI 12 week begin 4 day pulse load .
